scripts.test-wasm: cd crates/loro-wasm && deno task dev && cd ../../loro-js && pnpm i && pnpm run test
scripts.coverage: mkdir -p coverage && cargo llvm-cov nextest --features test_utils,jsonpath --lcov > coverage/lcov-nextest.info && cargo llvm-cov report
scripts.release-wasm: cd crates/loro-wasm && deno task release && cd ../../loro-js && pnpm i && pnpm build && pnpm run test
scripts.run-fuzz-corpus: cd crates/fuzz && cargo +nightly fuzz run all -- -max_total_time=1
